    Calculate a trimmed mean, removing n values from each end of the sequence

    mean_trim_by_n.Rd

    Calculate a trimmed mean, removing n values from each end of the sequence

    mean_trim_by_n(x, n.trim)

    Arguments

    x

    A numeric vector

    n.trim

    A number

    Value

    The vector mean with 'n.trim' values removed from each end before calculating
